comment._content: Fantastic shot! Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Lavoro - Work -Trabajo, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment._content: duastin: We received your request to have a Library of Congress photo added to your group: Lavoro - Work - Trabajo. Please click on the "Invite this photo to..." link below the comment box and we'll accept it.
